onset.Description: Position (latency) of event marker in seconds relative to the start.

duration.Description: Duration of the event, set typically to n/a. Instead, the duration of the event is determined by the onset/offset flags or the next event.

sample.Description: Temporal position (latency) of event marker relative to the start, in data frames.

Levels.newPage: New page of symbol search queries was shown.

event_code.Description: The original code used during data collection to indicate an event marker

Levels.20: New page of symbol search queries was shown

Levels.0: Symbol was not present in the search query
Levels.1: Symbol was present in the search query

hed_defs.Description: Metadata dictionary for defining the stimulus
